entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Moncton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. High zero except plus 5 over southern sections.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain this morning then to periods of rain or freezing rain near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light this afternoon. High zero except plus 5 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
